dc_description_s: These files contain daily weather and temperature data collected at QUBS Point, Queen's University Biological Station (18T 0394774 4935427), between January 1 and December 31 each year (1993-2010). Variables included are air temperature (mean, max, min, time at max, time at min); soil temperature (mean, max, min, time at max, time at min); and water temperature of Lake Opinicon at depths of 0.2m, 2.2m and 3.3m (mean, max, min, time at max, time at min for all).
